price: 112. (El Profeta) rogó (a Al-lah) diciendo: “¡Señor!, juzga (entre nosotros) con justicia”. Nuestro Señor es el Clemente, a Quien recurrimos contra (las mentiras) que dicen.
arabic: قَٰلَ رَبِّ ٱحۡكُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَرَبُّنَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلۡمُسۡتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi uḥ'kum bil-ḥaqi warabbunā al-raḥmānu al-mus'taʿānu ʿalā mā taṣifūna
translations: the One Whose help is sought
